recipes: The remote and rotting chateau of the Comtes des Raveline was looted long ago. We have found hints that it was not looted thoroughly enough. There may be a secret room. Equally, there may be a curse.[Expeditions need at least one Funds per obstacle. Followers will defeat obstacles. If you run out of Funds or Followers, the Expedition ends.]

Fermier Abbey, folded into the forest like a jewel-box smuggled in a green robe. If we can make it through the forest, we'll still have to face the monks.[Expeditions need at least one Funds per obstacle. Followers will defeat obstacles. If you run out of Funds or Followers, the Expedition ends.]

In the black heart of Orthos Wood, we might find the tree where the masked Crow met its peers. But the forest itself is a peril, and the cannibal clans who live there are another. [Expeditions need at least one Funds per obstacle. Followers will defeat obstacles. If you run out of Funds or Followers, the Expedition ends.]
